entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023
